articles.title: Meta releases a new tool to protect reels creators from having their work stolen
articles.description: On Monday, Meta introduced Facebook content protection, a mobile tool designed to detect when a creator's original reels posted to Facebook are being
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Ford turns to Amazon to give used cars sales a boost
articles.description: Amazon Autos, which kicked off last year with Hyundai, initially started with new cars. The deal with Ford pushes it into used car territory.
articles.author: Kirsten Korosec

articles.title: Ramp hits $32B valuation, just 3 months after hitting $22.5B
articles.description: In 2025 alone, Ramp has leapt from being worth $13 billion to $32 billion with new rounds every few months.
articles.author: Julie Bort

articles.title: Cisco acquires translation startup EzDubs
articles.description: Cisco has acquired Y Combinator-backed translation app EzDub to integrate it into its communication suite.
articles.author: Ivan Mehta

articles.title: Luminar is fighting with its biggest customer as bankruptcy threat looms
articles.description: The fight comes at a perilous time for Luminar, which is running out of cash and under SEC investigation.
articles.author: Sean O'Kane

articles.title: Sequoia-backed fintech Aspora will let Indian diaspora pay bills back home
articles.description: The startup said that until now, users had to either transfer the money to their Indian accounts or ask someone to handle the bills for them. The
articles.author: Ivan Mehta

articles.title: Google rolls out its AI ‘Flight Deals’ tool globally, adds new travel features in Search
articles.description: To get started, users need to describe where, when, and how they want to travel. Flight Deals will then use AI to display the best bargains available.
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: DoorDash confirms data breach impacting users’ phone numbers and physical addresses
articles.description: The delivery giant said “no sensitive information” was accessed, and did not specify the number of customers, delivery workers, and merchants who
articles.author: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai

articles.title: PowerLattice attracts investment from ex-Intel CEO Pat Gelsinger for its power-saving chiplet
articles.description: PowerLattice, a startup founded by veteran electrical engineers from Qualcomm, NUVIA, and Intel in 2023, claims to have developed a groundbreaking
articles.author: Marina Temkin

articles.title: Jeff Bezos reportedly returns to the trenches as co-CEO of new AI startup, Project Prometheus
articles.description: Jeff Bezos is partly backing a new AI startup called Project Prometheus that has raised $6.2 billion in funding, and will take on duties as co-chief
articles.author: Ram Iyer

articles.title: Luminal raises $5.3 million to build a better GPU code framework
articles.description: Inference optimization startup Luminal has announced $5.3 million in a seed funding round led by Felicis Ventures, with angel investment from Paul
articles.author: Russell Brandom

articles.title: MCP AI agent security startup Runlayer launches with 8 unicorns, $11M from Khosla’s Keith Rabois and Felicis
articles.description: Three-time founder Andrew Berman is back with a startup that helps IT ensure business users' AI agents operate securely.
articles.author: Julie Bort

articles.title: Surveillance tech provider Protei was hacked, its data stolen, and its website defaced
articles.description: The defacement of Protei's website said "another DPI/SORM provider bites the dust," apparently referring to the company selling its web intercept and
articles.author: Zack Whittaker

articles.title: Bone AI raises $12M to challenge Asia’s defense giants with AI-powered robotics
articles.description: Bone AI, a South Korean startup, is combining AI and manufacturing to build next-gen defense robotics and challenge the region’s industry giants.
articles.author: Kate Park

articles.title: Sakana AI raises $135M Series B at a $2.65B valuation to continue building AI models for Japan
articles.description: Sakana AI raised about $135M at a $2.65B post-money valuation in one of Japan’s largest fundraises this year.
articles.author: Kate Park

articles.title: Danish startup Flatpay joins the club of European fintech unicorns to track
articles.description: Flatpay’s bet is that it can challenge larger players by charging small merchants a flat transaction rate to use its card terminals and
articles.author: Anna Heim
